name: Категории с более 3 блюд
sql: SELECT category, COUNT(*) FROM dish GROUP BY category HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;

name: Блюда, которые никогда не заказывали
sql: SELECT name FROM dish WHERE dishid NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT dishid FROM orderdish);

name: Количество заказов по статусам
sql: SELECT status, COUNT(*) FROM "Order" GROUP BY status;

name: Средний чек по дням недели
sql: SELECT EXTRACT(DOW FROM orderdatetime) AS day_of_week, TO_CHAR(orderdatetime, 'Day') AS day_name, AVG(totalcost) AS avg_check FROM "Order" GROUP BY day_of_week, day_name ORDER BY day_of_week;

name: Список текущих заказов
sql: SELECT * FROM public."Order" WHERE status <> 'Закрыт';

name: Сумма заказов за 2025-03-10
sql: SELECT SUM(totalcost) AS total_sum FROM "Order" WHERE orderdatetime::date = '2025-03-10';

name: Блины из меню
sql: SELECT dishid, "name", weight, nutritionalvalue, "cost" FROM public.dish WHERE category = 'Блины';

name: Сортировка меню по категории и названию
sql: SELECT * FROM dish ORDER BY category ASC, name ASC;

name: Сотрудники-официанты
sql: SELECT e.employeeid, e.fullname, e.phonenumber, e.email FROM public.employee e JOIN public.employeeposition ep ON e.employeeid = ep.employeeid JOIN public."position" p ON ep.positionid = p.positionid WHERE p.name = 'Официант';

name: Сотрудники, нанятые после 2025-03-04
sql: SELECT fullname, hiredate FROM public.employee WHERE hiredate > '2025-03-04';

name: Сотрудник, обрабатывающий заказ 34
sql: SELECT e.fullname FROM public."Order" o JOIN public.employee e ON o.employeeid = e.employeeid WHERE o.orderid = 34;

name: Состав блюда 'Микс овощной'
sql: SELECT i.name, di.quantity FROM public.dishingredient di JOIN public.ingredient i ON di.ingredientid = i.ingredientid JOIN public.dish d ON di.dishid = d.dishid WHERE d.name = 'Микс овощной';

name: Поставщики с рейтингом 8 и выше
sql: SELECT s.supplierid, s.companyname, s.reliabilityrating FROM public.supplier s WHERE s.reliabilityrating >= 8;

name: Поставщики молочных продуктов
sql: SELECT supplierid, companyname, contactinformation, reliabilityrating FROM public.supplier WHERE productcategory = 'Молочные продукты';

name: Продукты от 'ВЕРХНИЙ ЛУГ СООО'
sql: SELECT i.ingredientid, i.name, i.unitofmeasurement, i.instock, i.expirationdate FROM public.ingredient i JOIN public.supplier s ON i.supplierid = s.supplierid WHERE s.companyname = 'ВЕРХНИЙ ЛУГ СООО';

name: Продукты с наличием менее 10 единиц
sql: SELECT name, unitofmeasurement, instock FROM ingredient WHERE instock < 10 ORDER BY instock ASC;

name: Продукты с истекающим сроком годности
sql: SELECT name, instock, unitofmeasurement, expirationdate FROM ingredient WHERE expirationdate <= CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '7 days' ORDER BY expirationdate ASC;

name: Сотрудники, обрабатывающие заказы
sql: SELECT e.fullname, COUNT(o.orderid) AS orders_served FROM employee e LEFT JOIN "Order" o ON e.employeeid = o.employeeid GROUP BY e.employeeid, e.fullname HAVING COUNT(o.orderid) > 0 ORDER BY orders_served DESC;

name: Должности сотрудников с несколькими должностями
sql: SELECT e.fullname AS "Сотрудник", STRING_AGG(p.name, ', ') AS "Должности" FROM employee e JOIN employeeposition ep ON e.employeeid = ep.employeeid JOIN "position" p ON ep.positionid = p.positionid GROUP BY e.employeeid, e.fullname HAVING COUNT(ep.positionid) > 1;

name: 5 клиентов с наибольшей суммой заказов
sql: SELECT v.name, SUM(o.totalcost) AS totalcost FROM visitor v JOIN "Order" o ON v.visitorid = o.visitorid GROUP BY v.visitorid, v.name ORDER BY totalcost DESC LIMIT 5;

name: Клиенты с днем рождения в текущем месяце
sql: SELECT name, birthdate FROM visitor WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM birthdate) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_DATE);

name: Топ 3 поставщиков по количеству продукции
sql: SELECT s.companyname, COUNT(i.ingredientid) AS ingredients_count FROM supplier s LEFT JOIN ingredient i ON s.supplierid = i.supplierid GROUP BY s.supplierid, s.companyname ORDER BY ingredients_count DESC LIMIT 3;

name: 5 самых популярных ингредиентов
sql: SELECT i.name, COUNT(di.dishid) AS dish_count FROM ingredient i JOIN dishingredient di ON i.ingredientid = di.ingredientid GROUP BY i.name ORDER BY dish_count DESC LIMIT 5;

name: Ингредиенты, не используемые в блюдах
sql: SELECT name FROM ingredient WHERE ingredientid NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT ingredientid FROM dishingredient);

name: Средняя зарплата по должностям
sql: SELECT p.name, p.workschedule, AVG(p.salary) FROM "position" p JOIN employeeposition ep ON p.positionid = ep.positionid GROUP BY p.name, p.workschedule;

name: Order
sql:
SELECT * FROM public."Order"
ORDER BY orderid ASC
